body: @JohnMichealGarcia As the title suggests, there seems to be a caste in the setting of the story. The rest of the female characters past page 5 are senpais who found FMC to be really cheeky lately. So they decided to make her know her place by making MC fck her while she was drugged to sleep.

She is the leader of the bully gyarus so why did they sell her out to the one they bully? from what I understand, bully leader and bullied guy are childhood friends but things turned sour then we get the current situation.
